segments.text: Thank you for bringing me here . What shall we order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it all looks so good . How about ordering the steamed prawns ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I ’ d rather have the chicken feet to be honest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok then , let ’ s get the chicken feet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about drinks ? Would you like beer or wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wine ’ s fine by me . Let ’ s order a bottle of the house red then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , a bottle of the house red please !
segments.speaker: S2
